content: Golden Child, Crimson Blood is the fifth Chapter of Black Myth: Wukong, taking place in The Flaming Mountains where five element carts guard the mysteries of the region. This Walkthrough is divided up by the major regions in this chapter marked by Shrines, and includes guides to help you through each area, where to find important treasures and key items, and how to defeat the many required and optional bosses you'll find along the way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_5-Golden_Child,_Crimson_Blood.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 - Golden Child, Crimson Blood'.
The content is as follows:
Golden Child, Crimson Blood is the fifth Chapter of Black Myth: Wukong, taking place in The Flaming Mountains where five element carts guard the mysteries of the region. This Walkthrough is divided up by the major regions in this chapter marked by Shrines, and includes guides to help you through each area, where to find important treasures and key items, and how to defeat the many required and optional bosses you'll find along the way.
